t: Amazon.com Acquires Warehouse Property in Lancaster - Los Angeles Times
s: October 24, 2024 - Retailer Amazon.com acquired a 1.26 million-square-foot build-to-suit warehouse property in Lancaster for $26.7 million, or $371,000 per acre.
